messages.title: Why am backing Barrie...
messages.content: Marion Bond explains why she will be voting for Barrie Fairbairn on Thursday 8th June.

messages.title: We want to hear from you!
messages.content: It's important that all of us who are standing up for Grantham and Stamford hear from people about what our area needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working to stop hospital closures and improve care services
Labour promises to fund education properly.
More police on the streets and have a tough stance on violent crime.
